title: Ticket #7842: Add CCB statistics
description:
We need statistics for CCB (e.g. number of endpoints, number of successful and failed connection requests, etc.).

These are the stats we're adding:

  • CCBEndpointsConnected Number of active endpoints
  • CCBEndpointsRegistered Number of endpoints the server has reconnect information for. Should equal current endpoints plus recently-disconnected ones.
  • CCBReconnects Number of endpoints that have reconnected after a disconnect
  • CCBRequests Number of connection requests
  • CCBRequestsNotFound Number of connection requests to unknown endpoint ids
  • CCBRequestsSucceeded Number of successful connection requests
  • CCBRequestsFailed Number of failed connection requests
